techmeme.title: An overview of AI startups largely founded by former AI researchers from Google, including Reka, Ideogram, H, Inflection, and Character AI (The Information)
Inflection will cap free access to its AI chatbot Pi in the coming months and let users export their conversations as the startup focuses on enterprise products (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
Apple announces a September 9 event at Apple Park with the iPhone 16 lineup, new Apple Watch models, and AirPods 4 expected; the invitation says "It's Glowtime" (Juli Clover/MacRumors)
French President Emmanuel Macron says the government was not involved in the arrest of Telegram CEO Pavel Durov and "this is in no way a political decision" (Victor Goury-Laffont/Politico)
French agency OFMIN, established in 2023 to prevent violence against minors, issued the arrest warrant for Pavel Durov, who is a citizen of France and the UAE (Gaspard Sebag/Bloomberg)
